title: Possibly?
body: Do you think there might be a possibility of implementing some kind of translate function into the in-game chat? All I get lately are people speaking in some foreign language(s) and I have no idea what they want. I know you would probably get some horrible results from the translation but all you really need is a couple of key words to get your point across

replies.body: Something similar to FFXIV would be pretty minto.
Why would they do that? If you're on the Oceanic server, it's assumed that you speak English. I doubt Riot would implement something like that for a minority of people who don't
